name: Tea Party Simulator 2015â„¢
description: Ever wanted to be a tea party extraordinaire? Well now you can. Each new level brings it's own challenges you must overcome on your quest to become the ultimate tea party master. Comes with the original Tea Party Mode and now a Mode 2 (after beating all the levels), for a whole new experience!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 7800 GT or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 750 MB available space Additional Notes: Requires both keyboard and a mouse.

reviews.review_text: This is a fun enough game to play - it delivers what the store page claims. You are having a tea party with a stuffed animal (Ted), who demands certain items be dropped in front of him. You just go down the list. There are like five different environments.   Pros:  +It gets laughs just like  Surgeon Simulator  did +You can actually walk quite a bit around the area now   Cons:  -Regretfully, I didn't realize until after I purchased this, that this game is not made by the same developers that did  Surgeon Simulator , which is fine except they totally rip off the game style (same font, idea, and graphical style) -There is alot to interact with, but I feel there could be more. For example, there are many items/cabinets/handles on the fringes of the rooms that  look  interactable, but are not -Only five environments, as I have heard (I have witnessed two) -Price is steep for what it is   Overall, it was fun, but I certainly won't get  anywhere near  10 hours out of this. I was on the fence about the 'no' vote - but this is fair warning so my Steam friends know what they are getting into. This does not have the content of  Goat Simulator . I suppose the cheap laughs might be worth it if it is on deep discount.
Another crap simulator that we all needed in our lives.
It's just another non-sence game. Definitely not worth 10â‚¬.
Tea is serious business.
would be yes if this game didnt cost more than whats expected.. should be renamed from 'tea party simulator' to 'extra chromesome simulator' its way too hard to play.

After several hundred hours of this game, I can say it is not worth the money. It's quite funny at first but it just gets annoying after a while. I got this game as a gift from a friend, and I got a few laughs out of it, but I would not be happy if I had bought it. Wait for a big sale if this looks intresting to you.
Best game ever (y) 10 out of 10!!!
Got it for free.... Can't complain. If you wan't a game like this get Surgeon Simulator... way better

How can I state my feelings on this game. Only on the second level and I think I punched 'Ted' the Bear 10000 times for making comments when I mess up. Thank you for making a game that should have a warning like: 'May cause harm to your keyboard and mouse from extreme force of your fist hitting it, Chance of Police coming to your door from angering yelling and cursing, also n a rare chance of catching a stroke from rage fit.'  But Honestly its a addictive game I want to see through...I think I need to get those anger plush dolls for the space level
harder then both dark souls combined
good Tea Party
Surgeon Simulator knockoff programmed by a two-year old with no talent.                Don't play, let alone buy.

The game was entertaining for the first hour. Now that im stuck on the 2nd level and I've had to restart more than 700 times when everytime the cake goes flying off in a random direction the moment the game loads..   75% of the time when I grab an object, my hand instantly gets down syndrome and bends inward and I anytime I correct it, it just derps back into place.  1/10 Would rather crotch punch a gorilla.

Ever wanted to feel completely useless as a human being? Ever wanted your teddy bear to hate you?  If you answered yes to any of these, this is the game for you!  I accidentally punched my bear off the table trying to give it a cookie. It got so angry that it left my tea party, I was left at the table.... with broken plates everywhere.... cookies strewn across the floor.... alone.... to cry in my own self pity,   10/10 would play again
Probably the most frustrating game I have ever played.. I only recommend it if you would like to lose your mind..

You might hear some people brush this little simulator off as a SS clone or rip off. After playing through this game I went back to try SS again and honestly I like this better. I wouldn't call it a rip off but rather an evolution. I find this game overall less frustrating but theres enough variety and easter eggs to keep me entertained longer as well. I enjoy it for what it was.
the teddy is always there for you, he will accompany you in this game he will protect you he loves you he wants to murder you when you fail
Nice game tbh
So this is what it's like being Mr. Bean.... 10/10 would play teddy simulator again.

This game is the best simulator game so far and here i why  + Nice company to have tea with + You can beat the game + You can make tea in british way + You can make tea in japanese way + Good sound effects + Game itself has a low price + U can name your teddy (well, i did, but not ingame)  Only minus is that it doesnt have multiplayer.

Got this game somewhere on the internet for free. I would say i had a good amount of fun trying to get all achievments although some are not possible without major skill. There are trading cards so that is a plus too. I would say its worth like $5 but not quite $10.  Still got me interested more than most games I play!
I cant believe the bad reviews for this, this game is hilarious. Makes Ampu-tea look like trash.
